query: Could you assist in planning a 7-day trip for a group of 5, starting in Detroit with plans to visit 3 cities in New York from March 11th to March 17th, 2022? Our travel budget has been adjusted to $10,600. We require accommodations that permit visitors, and we are not planning on taking any flights. We have a preference for Indian, Italian, Mediterranean, and French cuisines.
actions: choose_city_bundle:[Rochester,Syracuse,Niagara Falls]
